scheme_name: Dr. YSR Aarogyasri Health Insurance Scheme
description: Dr. YSR Aarogyasri provides financial assistance for hospitalization and treatment of serious ailments for families below the poverty line.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

special_notes: Includes free follow-up consultations and diagnostics
